children.value: Empathy is how we create a more human-centered design business—it’s who we are. Explore some of our strategic work that prioritizes the needs of the people we design for, and learn from the humans who make it all possible.

It’s about time we design an equitable future. The Racial Equity in Design initiative is committed to instilling racial equity at our company and our industry through our interactions, investments, and actions.

children.value: Celebrating our diverse community is a point of pride for IBM as we continually strive towards a more inclusive workplace. Explore insights from women in design who are driving innovation and impact across IBM.
